params.to: The address to mint the NFT to.
params.uri: The URI to assign to the NFT.

cancel(uint256).notice: Let's a loyalty card owner or approved operator cancel the loyalty card.

mintTo(address,string).notice: Lets an account with MINTER_ROLE mint an NFT.

revoke(uint256).notice: Let's an approved party cancel the loyalty card (no approval needed).
